Instrument.name: Mars Global Surveyor Spacecraft Mars Orbiter Camera
Instrument.description: The Mars Global Surveyor (MGS) Spacecraft Mars Orbiter Camera (MOC) captured high-resolution images of Mars' surface, providing detailed views of its geology and weather patterns. It helped map the planet's surface, revealing features like valleys, craters, and evidence of past water flow. The MOC also observed seasonal changes and provided data on Martian dust storms and atmospheric dynamics. These images were critical for identifying potential landing sites for future missions and understanding Mars' geological history.
